name: Send data needed for Electronic Sales Registration via a Twilio SMS message (using a free Twilio account)
description: Every time a new SMS message is received from a specific number in Twilio, Make will automatically read the amount of sale from the message. Afterwards, it will get data needed for Electronic Sales Registration from the EET system and send it via Twilio SMS message to a specified number. This template is designed for users who have a free Twilio account.
